title: Federal Govt further enhances 200 MW supply to K-Electric: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 03 (APP): Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar has said that additional 200MW electricity was being provided to K-Electric to get rid of Karachiites from power load-shedding.
On his social media handle, the minister said on Thursday that earlier the federal government was providing 350 MW electricity to K-Electric.
However, now it was decided to further enhance 200 MW supply to the K-Electric, he said.
